mapper.select: #具体课程试听人数 SELECT COUNT(1) AS num, course.`name`, course.id as id FROM `trial_lesson_customer` tlc LEFT JOIN `trial_lesson` tl ON tl.id = tlc.trail_lession_id LEFT JOIN course ON course.id = tl.course_id GROUP BY tl.`course_id`

#申请试听不同类型课程人数占比 SELECT COUNT(1) AS num, course.`type`, tlc.id FROM `trial_lesson_customer` tlc LEFT JOIN `trial_lesson` tl ON tl.id = tlc.trail_lession_id LEFT JOIN course ON course.id = tl.course_id GROUP BY course.`type`
#申请报名不同类型课程人数占比 SELECT COUNT(1) AS num, course.`type`, course.id FROM `registration` regist LEFT JOIN course ON course.id = regist.`perfer_course_id` GROUP BY course.`type`

#具体课程平均评分 SELECT AVG(tlcom.score) AS score, course.name, tl.course_id as id FROM `trial_lesson_comment` tlcom LEFT JOIN `trial_lesson` tl ON tl.`id` = tlcom.`trial_id` LEFT JOIN `trial_lesson_customer` tlcust ON tlcust.`trail_lession_id` = tl.`id` LEFT JOIN course ON course.id = tl.course_id GROUP BY tl.`course_id`
#各个时间段选择情况 SELECT period, COUNT(*) AS num FROM `trial_lesson` tl JOIN `trial_lesson_customer` tlcust ON tlcust.`trail_lession_id` = tl.`id` JOIN course ON course.id = tl.course_id GROUP BY period;
